items.text: gone, that's beautifully bowled! Mushfiqur falls one short of what would have been a magnificent hundred. Fullish outside off, and again he gets it to nip away off the track, against the angle. Looks to drive it with an open face, and only manages an edge through to the keeper
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim c †Sarfaraz Ahmed b Shaheen Shah Afridi 99 (116b 9x4 0x6) SR: 85.34

items.preText: Mushfiqur is the first Bangladesh batsman to be dismissed for 99 in all international cricket. In walks Mehidy Hasan Miraz.
items.text: back of a length, angling into off stump. Shuffles across and works it to the right of mid-on
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: shot! That's full outside off, and Mahmudullah makes a bit of extra room to slap that powerfully to the point boundary
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mahmudullah, FOUR runs

items.text: short, wide, and that's brilliantly played. Stabbed with an open face to beat backward point to his left
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.text: tossed up fuller, clipped down to long-on
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: flatter legbreak, on a good length close to off stump. Looks to drive into the covers, ends up inside-edging into the on side
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: again he's a little early on the drive as Shadab flights this outside off. Ends up hitting it back to the bowler instead of through the covers
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: shortish, just a bit of width, punched away to the left of sweeper cover
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, 2 runs

items.text: flighted googly on off stump. Strides forward and clips into the square leg region
items.shortText: Shadab Khan to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: thigh-high full-toss on leg stump, tucked away to long leg
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: back of a length outside off, steered to the right of third man
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: fullish, slanting down leg. Looks to flick and misses, rolls into the leg side off the front pad
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mahmudullah, 1 leg bye

items.preText: Jigar Shah: "40 runs more from here and BD will sense a step into the final. A mini-collapse here and all hard work of BD batsman will be wasted and Pak will see itself ahead at halfway stage. Wow.. cricket."
items.text: back of a length on off stump, opens his bat face and dabs behind point
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: full on off stump, driven firmly and extra-cover is back on the 30-yard circle, allowing the quick single
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Gowtham: "Not to take anything away from Mushy, I feel he gets far too ahead of himself in pressure and tense situations. If he can handle those better he is going to crank up big numbers more consistently."
items.text: slower length ball close to off stump. Presses forward, lets it come, and eases it to deep point
items.shortText: Shaheen Shah Afridi to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: back of a length on off stump, shuffles across to work it to long leg
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: back of a length close to off stump, gets it to straighten off the pitch. Only offers half a bat, looking to guide it down to third man with an open face, and the ball slides past his outside edge
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mahmudullah, no run

items.text: fuller outside off, and Mahmudullah drives crisply to sweeper cover. He's a little cross with himself - may have wanted to hit it squarer
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: digs it in and gets it to climb towards Mehidy's right shoulder. Does well to step across and control the pull down to deep square leg
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.text: back of a length slower one outside off. Whipped away to deep square leg. Wanted to hit it through the off side. I think, and went too early so he had to adjust with a roll of his wrists
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.text: short, rising ball in the corridor. Gets off his toes to ride the bounce and squeeze it to the left of backward point
items.shortText: Hasan Ali to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run

items.preText:
Junaid from round the wicket.

Muddasir Ali: "Is 250 a par total considering the pitch, Pakistan's batting form and Bangladesh's bowling attack?" -- I think 250 will make for an engrossing second innings. These pitches and big outfields have made for some lovely ODI cricket.
items.text: goes nice and full to start his new spell, close to off stump. Clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, no run

items.text: gone! Again, he goes full, angling in towards off stump. Isn't quite a yorker, and that works against Mehidy as he looks to flick this over midwicket. Not full enough to force him to play along the ground, too full to give him the elevation to get it over the fielder, and in the end he offers him a chest-high catch
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, OUT

dismissal.text: Mehidy Hasan Miraz c sub (Shan Masood) b Junaid Khan 12 (11b 1x4 0x6) SR: 109.09

items.preText: Mashrafe Mortaza walks in at No. 8. How's he going to play this?
items.text: length ball close to off stump, defended to short extra-cover. Good thinking to have that fielder save the single at this stage, and keep Mashrafe on strike
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: length ball on off stump, defended back to the bowler
items.shortText: Junaid Khan to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run
